full_text: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637- (b)(6) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) Sent: Thursday, July 11, 2019 9:43 PM To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS); (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS); (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) Subject: Subpoena and Request for Emails Importance: High Attached please find a subpoena for recordings of Jeffrey Epstein's phone calls, excluding any attorney calls. In addition to the materials requested in the enclosed subpoena, please accept our written request for the e-mail correspondence of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (76318-054) from July 6, 2019 through July 11, 2019 - excluding any correspondence between Epstein (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) As you can see on the subpoena, we have set the return date for tomorrow (July 12, 2019). We would be very grateful if we could receive the requested materials as soon as possible. As always, please feel free to call (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) or me with any questions or concerns. Thanks very much, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637 (b)(6) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov Page 6332 DOJ-OGR-00024285

text_blocks.content: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637- (b)(6) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) Sent: Thursday, July 11, 2019 9:43 PM To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS); (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS); (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) Subject: Subpoena and Request for Emails Importance: High
Attached please find a subpoena for recordings of Jeffrey Epstein's phone calls, excluding any attorney calls.

In addition to the materials requested in the enclosed subpoena, please accept our written request for the e-mail correspondence of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (76318-054) from July 6, 2019 through July 11, 2019 - excluding any correspondence between Epstein (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

As you can see on the subpoena, we have set the return date for tomorrow (July 12, 2019). We would be very grateful if we could receive the requested materials as soon as possible. As always, please feel free to call (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) or me with any questions or concerns.
Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637 (b)(6) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov

additional_notes: The document contains redactions of personal information and email addresses.
